body: Well I was on a game of nebula and it was full with disrespectful people , rude aggressive and people who really couldn't stop spamming In-game chat saying "he hacks" . There were so many people It took almost 10 minutes for me to calm them all down with great difficulty ! Hopefully the new "Batch" of mods should be on at this time for Europe to stop these people getting away with it !
